summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 應用程式中資料繫結控制項的實體資料模型 (EDM)。

span.span: Represents an Entity Data Model (EDM) to data-bound controls in an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 您可以使用以及從 EDM 擷取資料，來顯示、 編輯和排序資料，在網頁上使用幾乎任何程式碼的資料繫結控制項的控制項。You can use the control together with a data-bound control to retrieve data from an EDM and to display, edit, and sort data on a Web page by using little or no code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [EntityDataSource Web 伺服器控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f)。For more information, see [EntityDataSource Web Server Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f09af00-9578-4744-a029-765710a3c83f). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的屬性控制項設定為`true`，控制項會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從指派給屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句屬性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. 如果您設定屬性，以`true`，您不應明確指派值給屬性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a value to the property. ## Examples 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並會使用值`OrderByDropDownList`設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `OrderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ``` 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並使用`DefaultValue`屬性的`Parameter`項目來設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the `DefaultValue` attribute of the `Parameter` element to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要篩選查詢結果等於運算式的實體類型屬性，您可以使用屬性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, you can use the property. 當屬性控制項設定為`true`，會自動產生該控制項`WHERE`子句中的參數的屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates a `WHERE` clause from the parameters in the of the property. 屬性的每個參數必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。The property of each parameter has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 如果您設定屬性，以`true`，您應該明確地指派`WHERE`子句屬性。If you set the property to `true`, you should not explicitly assign a `WHERE` clause to the property. ## 範例Example 在下例屬性設定為`true`。In the following example the property is set to `true`. 因此，的屬性必須符合包含在查詢結果的實體類型屬性名稱。Therefore, the of the property has to match an entity type property name that is included in the query results. 查詢會選取 SalesOrderID 和 TotalDue SalesOrderHeader 實體類型的屬性。The query selects the SalesOrderID and TotalDue properties of the SalesOrderHeader entity type. 自動產生`WHERE`子句會篩選查詢結果，是比較 TotalDue 值 TotalDueList 清單方塊控制項中選取的值。The automatically generated `WHERE` clause will filter the query results by comparing the TotalDue value to a value selected in the TotalDueList list box control. ``` ``` ## 範例Example 預設的情況下， 屬性設定為 `false`。By default, the property is set to `false`. 這表示我們需要提供`WHERE`子句。This means that we have to supply the `WHERE` clause. 在下列範例中，`WHERE`子句是`Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"`totalDueParam 是參數名稱。In the following example, the `WHERE` clause is `Where="it.TotalDue < @totalDueParam"` and totalDueParam is the parameter name. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援自動查詢所傳回的資料進行分頁。The control supports automatically paging through the data returned by queries. 屬性是布林值屬性，指出是否啟用分頁的繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回的資料。The property is a Boolean property that indicates whether paging is enabled for data that is returned by queries bound to data controls. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，則控制項會新增至適當的查詢產生器方法根據提供給資訊資料繫結控制項。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值屬性會決定是否屬性支援的資料來源的控制項`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the property of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`. 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 這表示當您設定屬性來定義投影，並讓設為`true`，您也必須設定屬性來定義的順序，或設定屬性設`true`並新增訂單參數集合。This means that when you set the property to define a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項支援自動排序查詢所傳回的資料。The control supports automatically sorting the data returned by queries. 屬性控制項是布林值屬性，指出是否啟用繫結至資料控制項的查詢所傳回之資料的排序。The property of the control is a Boolean property that indicates whether sorting is enabled for data that is returned by queries that are bound to data controls. 當這個屬性設定為`true`，則控制項會新增至適當的查詢產生器方法根據提供給資訊資料繫結控制項。When this property is set to `true`, the control adds the appropriate query builder methods to the based on the information supplied to the by the data-bound control. 值屬性會決定是否並的屬性支援的資料來源的控制項`true`或`false`。The value of the property determines whether the and properties of the control that supports the data source is `true` or `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項可讓您指定使用自訂的 Entity SQL 運算式的查詢。The property of the control enables you to specify a query that uses a custom Entity SQL expression. 例如 SELECT 陳述式中，建立不是可更新的原始資料的投影。Like the SELECT statement, creates a projection of the original data that is not updatable. 當屬性指派、 更新、 插入和刪除功能會停用。When the property is assigned, update, insert, and delete functionalities are disabled. 在此情況下，方法， ，並相關所有傳回的控制`false`。In this case, the methods , , and of the related control all return `false`. 當屬性設定，則會擲回例外狀況時方法呼叫由資料繫結至控制項控制如果的值， ，或設為`true`。When the property is set, an exception is thrown when the method is called by a control that is data bound to an control if the value of , , or is set to `true`. 如果設為傳回屬性的預測結果的查詢 (例如，"`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`")、會傳回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, "`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`"), a will be returned. ## Examples 下列範例會使用提供的 Entity SQL 命令，來傳回 Product 物件的集合。The following example uses the supplied Entity SQL command to returns a collection of Product objects. ``` ``` 下列範例會傳回一系列的資料行投影：The following example returns a projected series of columns: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以從儲存在應用程式組態檔的項目中的具名 EDM 連接字串初始化控制項。The property of the control can be initialized from a named EDM connection string stored in the element of the application configuration file. 使用實體資料模型精靈 建立 EDM 時，應用程式組態檔中建立具名的 EDM 連接。When the EDM is created by using the Entity Data Model Wizard, a named EDM connection is created in the application configuration file. 應用程式組態檔中找到具名的 EDM 連接字串時，連線就會顯示為 EntityDataSource 設計工具中設定資料來源精靈 的選項。When a named EDM connection string is found in the application configuration file, the connection is visible as an option in the Configure Data Source wizard of the EntityDataSource designer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 設定資料來源精靈 （EntityDataSource 控制項）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e)。For more information, see [Configure Data Source Wizard (EntityDataSource Control)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/263976a5-2406-47c0-8919-c6af6e76d78e). 如果未指定屬性，這兩個並屬性必須為控制項建立。If the property is not specified, both the and properties must be set for the control to create the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理這個事件來存取所用的控制項來執行查詢，並追蹤變更。Handle this event to access the that is used by the control to execute the query and track changes. 這個內容物件可儲存及用於後續作業之外。This context object can be stored and used for successive operations outside the . 取自時所傳回事件。The is obtained from the that is returned by the event. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 物件的內容生命週期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 如需有關物件內容的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). 事件可讓您指派之外的後續作業的變數，而建立。The event allows you to assign the that has been created to a variable for successive operations outside the . 屬性包含的內容中已建立事件。The property contains the context that has been created in the event. 如果使用者不能指派期間的內容事件中包含的內容執行個體是由根據， ，或屬性。If the user does not assign a context during the event, the context instance contained in is the one created by the based on the , , or properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理這個事件，以防止供從正在處置的控制項。Handle this event to prevent the used by the control from being disposed of. 這樣做，當您想要使用單一在您的網頁具有數個控制項或執行個體的執行個體控制項。Do this when you want to use a single instance in your page with several controls or instances of the control. 若要避免從正在處置，設定屬性物件`true`。To prevent the from being disposed of, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 物件的內容生命週期管理 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160)。For more information, see [Object Context Life-Cycle Management (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/67bc2486-112c-47c3-b23f-0297f7ac2160). 如需有關物件內容的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)。For more information about the object context, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0). ## Examples 若要保留的現有日後參考取消的執行個體成員事件，如下列程式碼所示。To keep an existing instance member for future reference cancel the event as shown by the following code. ```csharp protected void EntityDataSource2_ContextDisposing(object sender, EntityDataSourceContextDisposingEventArgs e) { e.Cancel = true; } ```

summary.span: 發生於物件從資料來源中刪除之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發之後就已經成功地呼叫方法上刪除的物件。The event is raised after the method has just been successfully called on the to delete an object. 屬性物件用來存取已刪除的物件。The property of the object is used to access the deleted object. 此物件處於狀態。This object is in a state. 刪除物件時，發生錯誤時引發事件時，屬性物件集所傳回，而屬性設定為`null`。If an error occurs when an object is deleted, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存在檢視狀態，而且您必須將每個 HTTP 要求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

summary.span: 取得或設定運算式，這個運算式會指定要包含在查詢結果中的相關物件。

span.span: Gets or sets the expression that specifies the related objects to include in the query results.

value.span: 查詢結果中所傳回之查詢路徑的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: Comma-separated list of query paths to return in the query results.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項指定以逗號分隔的清單定義以及特別是查詢的物件傳回的物件 thatare 的查詢路徑。The property of the control specifies a comma-separated list of query paths that define the objects thatare returned together with the specifically queried object. 傳遞字串中每個以逗號分隔的值，而不需修改，為個別呼叫方法所要執行的[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。Each comma-separated value in the string is passed, without modification, as a separate call to the method of an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是由受管制的資料來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 屬性會套用至引數執行前。The property is the argument applied to the before it is executed. 此字串提供給屬性設定為傳遞至字串使用相同的格式方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用查詢路徑，以自動載入相關的物件的範例，請參閱[如何： 使用查詢路徑來塑造結果](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093)。For examples of how to use query paths to automatically load related objects, see [How to: Use Query Paths to Shape Results](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/100bf7f5-00ba-4c17-8e27-7a8a14831093). 當屬性用來指定查詢路徑，相關實體的屬性僅適用於唯讀資料繫結。When the property is used to specify query paths, the properties of the related entities can only be used for read-only data-binding. 如果相關的物件未明確包含在查詢路徑中，屬性描述元是否仍然可供資料繫結，但屬性本身會傳回 null 值。If related objects are not explicitly included in the query path, the property descriptors are still available for data binding, but the properties themselves return null values. 在此情況下，您必須明確地顯示其值載入相關的物件。In this case, the related objects must be explicitly loaded to display their values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 載入相關物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1)。For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1). ## Examples 下列的 XML 標記定義查詢路徑，以便傳回`SalesOrderHeader`所傳回的物件關聯`Contact`物件。The following XML markup defines a query path that returns `SalesOrderHeader` objects related to the returned `Contact` object. 與每個`SalesOrderHeader`，相關`SalesOrderDetail`和`Address`物件也會傳回。With each `SalesOrderHeader`, the related `SalesOrderDetail` and `Address` objects are also returned. ``` ``` 先前 XML 範例等同於下列名為`customers`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `customers`: ``` ObjectQuery customers = context.Contact .Where("it.ContactID = @ContactID", new ObjectParameter("ContactID", customerId)) .Include("SalesOrderHeader.SalesOrderDetail") .Include("SalesOrderHeader.Address"); ```

summary.span: 發生於在資料來源位置建立新物件之後。

span.span: Occurs after a new object is created at the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入的物件建立資料來源中時，或將物件資料保存到資料來源時，發生錯誤，會引發事件。The event is raised when the added object is created in the data source or if an error has occurred when the object data is persisted to the data source. 屬性物件用來存取加入的物件。The property of the object is used to access the added object. 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何與資料來源產生的值傳回的值。The properties of this object contain values that are returned from the data source, including any data source-generated values. 如果發生錯誤時物件會保存到資料來源就會引發事件和屬性物件集所傳回。If an error occurs when an object is persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新物件保存至資料來源之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before a new object is persisted to the data source. 事件可讓您修改或驗證所加入的物件、 新增不同的物件，或取消作業。The event enables you to modify or verify the object being added, add a different object, or cancel the operation. 您可以從要加入的物件屬性物件。You can access the object to be added from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的物件，使用者會負責設定中的正確的實體類型屬性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 若要停止從要加入的物件，設定的屬性物件到`true`。To stop the object from being added, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果建立新的物件時，就會發生錯誤就會引發事件和屬性物件集傳回。If an error occurs when creating a new object, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 當您處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項是字串，表示 Entity SQL 查詢的運算式。The property of the control is a string that represents an expression of an Entity SQL query. 這個字串會傳遞，不需修改為藉由執行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是由受管制的資料來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 此字串提供給屬性設定為傳遞至字串使用相同的格式方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來排序查詢結果的範例，請參閱[如何： 排序資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7)。For examples of how to use the clause to order query results, see [How to: Sort Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c05f2506-cb9d-4ebc-822b-300042ad53e7). ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將它傳遞做為參數屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 先前 XML 範例相當於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is equivalent to the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的屬性控制項設定為`true`，控制項會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句中的參數從指派給屬性。When the property of the control is set to `true`, the control automatically generates an ORDER BY clause from the parameter in the assigned to the property. 這就不需要明確地指派至 ORDER BY 子句屬性。This eliminates the need to explicitly assign an ORDER BY clause to the property. ORDER BY 子句，從建構屬性的所需屬性集合中的參數識別的項目，從查詢傳回的單一屬性。The construction of the ORDER BY clause from the property requires that the property of the parameter in the collection identifies a single property of the item that is returned from the query. ## Examples 下列範例會自動產生 ORDER BY 子句，並會使用值`orderByDropDownList`設定參數的值。The following example automatically generates the ORDER BY clause and uses the value of the `orderByDropDownList` to set the value of the parameter. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項包含字串，表示的 Entity SQL 查詢陳述式。The property of the control contains a string that represents the statement of an Entity SQL query. 這可讓您將一組指定的查詢所傳回物件的屬性。This enables you to project a specified set of properties from the objects returned by the query. 這個字串會傳遞，不需修改為藉由執行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to the that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是由受管制的資料來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 此字串提供給屬性設定為傳遞至字串使用相同的格式方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來定義查詢投影的範例，請參閱[如何： 執行查詢，傳回匿名型別物件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d)。For examples of how to use the clause to define a projection for a query, see [How to: Execute a Query that Returns Anonymous Type Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3b264025-e911-4d73-90ce-992d2b9d189d). 不支援更新預計的資料。Updates are not supported for projected data. 這表示當您使用屬性，以指定的投影，繫結的資料繫結不支援更新。This means that when you use the property to specify a projection, the bound data binding does not support updates. 當您定義投影啟用分頁時，您必須定義排序結果所依據的屬性。When you define a projection with paging enabled, you must define the property by which to order the results. 這表示當您設定屬性來定義投影，具有設為`true`，您也必須設定屬性來定義的順序，或設定屬性設`true`並新增訂單參數集合。This means the when you set the property to defined a projection and have set to `true`, you must also set the property to define the order or set the property to `true` and add an ORDER BY parameter to the collection. nelze nastavit，pokud ， ，或已啟用。 cannot be set if , , or is enabled. 如果設定為傳回屬性的預測結果的查詢 (例如`SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`)、會傳回。If the is set to a query that returns a projection of properties (for example, `SELECT p.ProductID, p. Name FROM AdventureWorksEntities.Products AS p`), a will be returned. ## Examples 使用下列的 XML 標記具有六個產品類型的屬性中指定的投影的屬性：The following XML markup uses the property to specify a projection with six of the properties of the Product type: ``` ``` 先前 XML 範例等同於下列名為`products`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `products`: ``` ObjectQuery products = context.Product .Select(it.[ProductID], it.[Name], it.[ListPrice], it.[Size], it.[Style], it.[Weight]) .OrderBy("it.[ProductID]"); ```

summary.span: 發生於查詢已執行之後。

span.span: Occurs after a query has been executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已執行的查詢，並在傳回資料之後，會引發事件。The event is raised after a query has been executed and data has been returned. 如果查詢準備或執行期間發生錯誤時，它也會引發。It is also raised if an error occurred during query preparation or execution. 的屬性物件包含的查詢所傳回的物件。The property of the object contains an of objects that are returned from the query. 處理來擷取與儲存的事件傳回實體中的。Handle the event to retrieve and store returned entities in the . 這樣做可以保存的頁面上的物件變更。Do this to persist object changes on the page. 屬性物件中所有頁面，不論分頁的資料繫結控制項所傳送的值顯示的物件總數。The property of the object shows the total number of objects in all pages, regardless of the values passed by the data-bound control for paging. 是僅擷取的資料繫結控制項需要它，例如，如果啟用分頁。 is only retrieved if the data-bound control needs it, such as if paging is enabled. 如果錯誤發生於準備或執行查詢時引發事件時，屬性物件集所傳回，而屬性設定為`null`。If an error occurs when the query is prepared or executed, the event is raised, the property of the object is set to the returned , and the property is set to `null`. 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 發生於查詢建構及執行之前。

span.span: Occurs before a query is constructed and executed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構及執行查詢之前，就會引發事件。The event is raised before a query is constructed and executed. 處理事件，以修改的組態或讀取或變更引數，從資料繫結控制項，才能建構及執行查詢。Handle the event to modify the configuration of the or read or change the arguments from the data-bound control before the query is constructed and executed. 設定的屬性物件到`true`取消查詢。Set the property of the object to `true` to cancel the query. 當取消選取的作業時，會不傳回任何資料至資料繫結控制項。When the SELECT operation is canceled, no data is returned to the data-bound control. 如果`AllowPaging`設定為`true`在資料繫結控制項中，叫用並上查詢產生器方法使用的值和屬性物件。If `AllowPaging` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the invokes the and query builder methods on using the values of the and properties of the object. 如果`AllowSorting`設定為`true`在資料繫結控制項中，的物件可以變更時處理事件。If `AllowSorting` is set to `true` in the data-bound control, the of the object can be changed when the event is handled. 任何其他查詢運算子，例如 WHERE 或 ORDER BY，在網頁標記中所指定之後，會套用就會引發事件。Any other query operators, such as WHERE or ORDER BY, that are specified in the page markup are applied after the event is raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要追蹤的變更時更新和刪除作業都已啟用，控制項都必須儲存中載入物件的原始值的相關資訊。To track changes when update and delete operations are enabled, the control must store information about original values of loaded objects in the . 儲存此必要的資訊的檢視狀態中，會增加的頁面大小。Storing this required information in the view state will increase the page size. 您可以停用儲存的檢視狀態中的原始值，藉由設定屬性設`false`。You can disable storing original values in the view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果這樣做，請[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]無法追蹤更新的物件中的並行存取。If you do this, the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] cannot track concurrency in updated objects. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 更新資料 (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246)。For more information, see [Updating Data (EntityDataSource)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca153eec-6817-4c1d-b262-efd6d35b0246).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作事件，以提供與 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 的相容性。The event is implemented to provide for compatibility with ASP.NET Dynamic Data. 此情況下，所定義介面，請明確實作的。This event, defined by the interface, is explicitly implemented by the . 無法註冊此事件處理常式，在標記中。A handler for this event cannot be registered in markup. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 事件會提供傳回的物件。The event provides an object that returns the . 可能引發事件，在下列情況：The event may be raised in the following cases: - 當建立物件。When an object is created. 這可讓屬性設定的驗證期間引發例外狀況物件上的部分方法。This enables the partial methods on the object to raise exceptions during validation of property settings. - 當查詢執行期間發生例外狀況。When an exception occurs during the execution of the query. - 例外狀況發生時執行任何插入期間，更新或刪除作業。When an exception occurs during the execution of any INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE operation.

summary.span: 發生於物件變更已保存至資料來源之後。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時已修改物件的變更會保存到資料來源，或套用變更時，發生錯誤，會引發事件。The event is raised when changes to a modified object are persisted to the data source or if an error has occurred when applying changes. 屬性物件用來存取已修改的物件。The property of the object is used to access the modified object. 此物件的屬性會包含從資料來源，包括任何伺服器產生的值傳回的值。The properties of this object contain values returned from the data source, including any server-generated values. 如果變更已保存至資料來源時發生錯誤就會引發事件和屬性物件集傳回。If an error occurs when changes are persisted to the data source, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 如果您在處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。If you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 4 或更早版本為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值會儲存在檢視狀態，並自動回傳之間維護。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4 or earlier, the property value is stored in view state and is automatically maintained between postbacks. ASP.NET 4.5 為目標的 web 應用程式，屬性值不會儲存在檢視狀態，而且您必須將每個 HTTP 要求的值。For web applications that target ASP.NET 4.5, the property value is not stored in view state, and you must set the value for each HTTP request.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Updating As EventHandler(Of EntityDataSourceChangingEventArgs)

summary.span: 發生於物件變更保存至資料來源之前。

span.span: Occurs before changes to an object are persisted to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前變更物件的屬性會保存至資料來源，就會引發事件。The event is raised before changes to the properties of an object are persisted to the data source. 事件可讓您修改或驗證之物件的變更、 提供不同的物件，或取消作業之前所做的變更會保存。The event enables you to modify or verify changes to the object, supply a different object, or cancel the operation before the changes are persisted. 您可以存取從修改過的物件屬性物件。You can access the modified object from the property of the object. 如果提供不同的物件，使用者會負責設定中的正確的實體類型屬性。If supplying a different object, the user is responsible for setting the correct entity type in the property. 處理事件，如果您必須修改物件來設定不同的並行存取控制的原始值。Handle the event if you must modify the for the object to set different original values for concurrency control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 儲存變更及管理並行存取](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e)。For more information, see [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b8378601-4f26-4a05-a24a-f50aeb68610e). 若要停止所保存的變更，請設定的屬性物件到`true`。To stop the changes from being persisted, set the property of the object to `true`. 如果具現化物件時，就會發生錯誤或修改屬性，就會引發事件和屬性物件集傳回。If an error occurs when instantiating an object or modifying properties, the event is raised and the property of the object is set to the returned . 當您處理中的例外狀況事件處理常式中，設定屬性設`true`。When you handle the exception in the event handler, set the property to `true`. 這可防止再次引發的例外狀況。This prevents the exception from being raised again. 當您指定的值`false`for屬性，重新引發例外狀況。When you specify a value of `false` for the property, the re-raises the exception.

summary.span: 取得或設定 Entity SQL 運算式，這個運算式會指定如何篩選查詢結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the Entity SQL expression that specifies how to filter the query results.

value.span: WHERE 子句。

span.span: The WHERE clause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性控制項是字串，表示為 Entity SQL 查詢的述詞子句。The property of the control is a string that represents a clause that is the predicate of an Entity SQL query. 這個字串會傳遞，不需修改為藉由執行[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]。This string is passed, without modification, to an that is executed by the [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]. 此查詢是由受管制的資料來源控制項。This query is the source of the data regulated by the control. 此字串提供給屬性設定為傳遞至字串使用相同的格式方法。The string supplied to the property uses the same format as the string that is passed to the method of . 如需如何使用子句來篩選查詢的範例，請參閱[如何： 篩選資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2)。For examples of how to use the clause to filter a query, see [How to: Filter Data](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776f8556-3350-4572-804a-b1513515c1b2). 若要篩選查詢結果等於運算式的實體類型屬性，請參閱資訊關於屬性。To filter query results by equating an entity type property to an expression, see information about the property. ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將它傳遞做為參數屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 先前 XML 範例等同於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 像是方法類別，可以指派給與述詞傳遞參數屬性。Like the method of the class, parameters can be passed to the predicate assigned to the property. 的屬性控制項會指定，包含要提供給查詢的 WHERE 子句的參數。The property of the control specifies a that contains the parameters to supply to the WHERE clause of the query. 屬性來參考提供給字串中所指定的參數使用具名引數屬性。The property uses named arguments to refer to the parameters that are specified in the string that is supplied to the property. 如果未設定屬性，參數替代項目。If the property is not set, no parameter substitution is made. WHERE 子句中的所有參數名稱前面都有符號 」`@"`必須有相符的名稱。All the parameter names in the WHERE clause preceded by the symbol "`@"` must have a matching name in the . 中的參數不允許 null 值。Null values are not allowed for parameters in a . ## Examples XML 標記，在下列範例中，在.aspx 檔案中，從控制項擷取值，並將它傳遞做為參數屬性。The XML markup in the following example, in an .aspx file, retrieves a value from a control and passes it as a parameter to the property. ``` ``` 先前 XML 範例等同於下列名為`onlineOrders`:The previous XML example is the same as the following named `onlineOrders`: ``` ObjectQuery onlineOrders = context.SalesOrderHeader .Where("it.OnlineOrderFlag = TRUE AND it.TotalDue > @ordercost", new ObjectParameter("ordercost", orderCost)) .OrderBy("it.TotalDue DESC"); ```
